website_summaries.verdict: Considering its bargain price, you'll get excellent photos from the Canon PowerShot A800. Just don't expect anything more than that and you'll be fine.
pros: The Canon PowerShot A800 is a no-frills point-and-shoot that takes AA-size batteries
It's easy to use and produces nice photos despite its low price
cons: The A800 has slow shooting performance and a low-resolution LCD that's very difficult to see in bright sunlight

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera... It is compact and has easy to use features... The resolution blows my old Kodak Easy Share away... The camera focuses and adjusts the flash automatically and you can take nice clear videos with good sound. If you are looking for a basic point and shoot camera, this is a good choice. It also has a zoom lens which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Littlerabbit

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Present
customer_reviews.text: I am not the one using this camera but gave it as a gift to my daughter. She loves it. Works really well for a point and shoot. She likes that it takes AA batteries. Photos are clear and the screen on the back of the camera lets you see the photo very well after the photo is taken or when looking at all photos on the card. No cons found so far.
customer_reviews.author: bigbird

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding picture quality with no delays
customer_reviews.text: I have an older Canon Powershot and really enjoy its features and picture quality. I thus purchased this one as a gift for my dad and it is even nicer than mine. It is an upgrade of the older model. Better MP and less delay. Easy to use and truly lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Jo B.

customer_reviews.title: Great low cost camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my dad. He is able to take some really good photos with it. It is a little bulky compared to the Canon Elph line, but still can fit in a pocket. I chose it for the low price and was impressed by the image quality.
customer_reviews.author: jciv

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: I got the camera for my grandparents, who are forever using disposable cameras with of course less than quality outcomes. I was looking for something with ease of use, a real point-and-shoot type camera but good quality. So far, my grandparents love it and have even expanded past point and shoot and are now using zoom and video. They love it, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Salge

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes very good pictures. It doesn't have a ton of special features. It takes a little while for the flash to charge. But for the price I am quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot A800
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. An inexpensive replacement camera that is automatic and does a great job. The zoom works real good and it takes good photo's.
customer_reviews.author: Corvette 828

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera, but......
customer_reviews.text: The pictures it takes are excellent for the money spent, but uploading them to the laptop is more of a pain than I'd like. I had to resort to the use of a USB memory card reader to upload them conveniently.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Nopper

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift or for anyone that just wants to point and shoot. I strongly recommend it. Good Quality
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price! We were looking for something very inexpensive since we have an almost professional one already which is a little bit heavy especially with the lenses. And this one is just what we needed to carry everywhere we go.
customer_reviews.author: Mila A.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great camera and easy to carry....takes good pictures and has plenty of features for the price. I never had a problem with camera.
customer_reviews.author: George Nenadovich

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: For the amazing price this is an amazing camera worth every penny and more. Easy to use, with great little features it is a great pocket quick shoot camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Get this guy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! It's a great value for the money! Can't wait to start snapping family, bar and general pics!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great for the price. the screen is average, but the zoom is fantastic!Storage is a little low but that's what SD cards are for! would definitely recommend this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Sarcastic Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product as mentioned with relivant price and good size, so you can hold it in your pocket anywhere I hope it last for long time.
customer_reviews.author: H. I. S. Alshehabi

customer_reviews.title: LCD screen is not bright enough for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit on special from Amazon. The LCD screen is clear and visible indoors but I couldn't see anything clearly on the LCD screen when trying to use the camera outside, even on a cloudy day! I am very disappointed with this camera and wouldn't recommend it to others. Dan
customer_reviews.author: Grampa Dan

product_meta.title: Canon Powershot A800 10 MP Digital Camera with 3.3x Optical Zoom (Black)
product_meta.description:
The Canon 5030B001 PowerShot A800 Black 10MP Digital Camera with 3.3x Optical Zoom and 2.5 In. Display is compact, stylish and colored to suit your personality. It features Smart AUTO that makes getting your best shot easy every time by automatically and intelligently selecting the proper settings for the camera based on 19 predefined shooting situations. PowerShot A800 makes it easy and fun to inject creative options into your photography with exciting Scene Modes like Super Vivid and Poster Effect. New Blur Reduction ensures crisp, clear shots in all kinds of situations. PowerShot A800 is perfect for young photographers, new photographers, and anyone who appreciates easy, high-quality digital photography and exceptional value.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Everything’s Easy
Smart AUTO intelligently selects the proper settings for the camera based on 19 predefined shooting situations.


Just set the Canon PowerShot A800 digital camera to Smart AUTO and you're ready for maximum enjoyment from your picture-taking every time. It's a relaxing and satisfying way to shoot because you can completely concentrate on your subject knowing that the camera has the technical details covered. Advanced Canon technology intelligently analyzes your situation and shooting conditions. Then it automatically selects an appropriate setting from 19 specially defined settings. So whether you're photographing flowers, a captivating sunset, or your friends at the park, you can be confident that you're getting dramatic, memorable images.





Smart AUTO
The camera automatically selects the best shooting settings for optimal quality based on subjects and environmental factors to provide point-and-shoot simplicity.





P Program
Access advanced exposure compensation features while shooting mostly automatically.





Blur Reduction
Boosts sensitivity to enable faster shutter speeds, reducing the effects of camera shake and subject movement.





Portrait
The camera sets a large aperture, focusing the subject and artistically blurring the background to make your subject “pop.”





Kids & Pets
Reduced focusing time freezes fast-moving subjects, so you won’t miss those special shots.





Face Self-timer
The camera will begin the self-timer once it detects a person entering the frame.





Low Light
For high quality image capture in an amazing range of dimly-lit situations.





Super Vivid
Super Vivid intensifies existing hues, saturating the scene with bright colors.





Poster Effect
Poster Effect combines several similar shades into one color, turning subtle gradations into eye-catching, scene-popping contrasts.





Beach
Get clear shots of people at a sunny beach without darkened faces.





Foliage
Capture brilliant shots of autumn foliage, greenery and blossoms.





Snow
Shoot clear snow scenes without darkened subjects or an unnatural bluish tint.





Sunset
Capture stunning sunsets with all the dazzle and impact.





Fireworks
Grab brilliant images of skyrocketing fireworks.





Long Shutter
Use to blur moving subjects for artistic effect, ideal for urban night photography.





Movie
Shoot in VGA (640 x 480) at 30 fps for up to 32 min. and 26 sec. or 4GB per clip and VGA (640 x 480) at 30 fps LP for up to 1 hr. 2 min. 51 sec. or 4GB per clip, and QVGA (320 x 240 at 30 fps) for up to 1 hour 31 min. and 25 sec. or 4GB per clip.

Loaded with Features, Packed with Value.
Easy to use, powerful A-Series camera with 10.0 Megapixels and 3.3x Optical Zoom makes picture-taking effortless.
With the PowerShot A800 digital camera, dramatic, personal pictures have never been easier to shoot and share. This 10.0 Megapixel camera lets you create impressive large photos of family and friends you'll be proud to display. The high-resolution images taken by the PowerShot A800 can be enlarged up to 13" x 19". The PowerShot A800 has a 3.3x Optical Zoom lens (35mm film equivalent 37 - 122mm) that let you capture up-close and memorable images.


New Scene Modes Help You Get Creative the Easy Way.
Scene Modes such as Super Vivid, Poster Effect and Blur Reduction really gives the shooter more creative freedom to capture images their way!
PowerShot A800 digital camera is equipped with plenty of easy ways give your shots high quality and fun creative touches.

Super Vivid mode is just what the name implies. When you shoot in this mode, colors are automatically heightened and saturated for an intensity that’s truly eye-popping. You’ll want to try it out in a wide range of applications – nature, city life, interiors and more – to get a feel for the effects you can create.

Poster Effect turns any conventional shot into an exciting, artistic “poster.” By making the transitions between colors more abrupt, the mode creates the effect of a hand-painted poster. Portraits are a natural for this mode, but you’ll find that the effect can give any shot a visually arresting new dimension.

Blur Reduction automatically reduces camera shake, so your shots are clear and steady. The system detects surrounding brightness and controls shutter speed – all while you’re concentrating on getting the shot you want. Without any extra effort on your part, your shots are crisp and detailed.




Get the Power Anywhere!
This AA battery-powered camera enables you to easily power up on the go! 
Conveniently, you don't need to worry about running out or recharging of batteries with the PowerShot A800 digital camera. Since AA-size batteries can be purchased at any store, simply get new ones locally.

See the Image on a Big Screen.
Bright, clear 2.5-inch LCD makes taking and viewing images a breeze.
The PowerShot A800’s 2.5-inch LCD screen gives you the big picture, whether you're shooting, reviewing or showing off your images. This high-resolution screen offers a crisp, clear and bright picture. It also features Night Display for easy viewing in low light.



2.5-inch LCD Screen


A Bold Pop of Color.
Comes in 3 cool, crisp colors to match any personality: Silver, Black and Red.
There's nobody else quite like you. So naturally, you demand a camera that is utterly you...like the Canon PowerShot A800. This camera makes getting what you want remarkably easy. Exquisitely compact, its design has smoothly curving edges. And it comes in three distinctive colors that let you tell the world who you really are. Express yourself as quietly or as boldly as you like. Simply take your pick from the stylish range of shades. There's a choice of Silver, Black or Red. Every color tells its own story and each creates a wonderful impression of you.
feature_bullets: 10 effective megapixels, 1/2.3-inch CCD image sensor; 3.3x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom
2.5 in. TFT LCD display; Built-in flash; 640 x 480p video recording
DIGIC III Image Processor; Scene Modes such as Super Vivid, Poster Effect and Blur Reduction
Smart AUTO (19 scenes); Face Detection; Red-eye Correction
USB 2.0 Hi-Speed; SD card slot (card not included)
Smart Auto intelligently selects settings from 19 predefined shooting situations
AA battery power enables you to easily power up on the go
Scene modes such as Super Vivid, Poster Effect and Blur Reduction

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars29 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
